trans-unit.resname: PISD·64★ | Ludevic's Test Subject | Card Name
PISD·64★ | Ludevic's Test Subject | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Defender {1}{U}: Put a hatchling counter on Ludevic's Test Subject. Then if there are five or more hatchling counters on it, remove all of them and transform it.
trans-unit.target: Defender {1}{U}: Put a hatchling counter on Ludevic's Test Subject. Then if there are five or more hatchling counters on it, remove all of them and transform it.

trans-unit.source: After several frustrating experiments, the visionary Ludevic realized he needed to create a monster that fed on torch-wielding mobs.
trans-unit.target: After several frustrating experiments, the visionary Ludevic realized he needed to create a monster that fed on torch-wielding mobs.

trans-unit.source: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

trans-unit.source: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.target: A devil's hands are never idle.

trans-unit.resname: PISD·193★ | Mayor of Avabruck | Card Name
PISD·193★ | Mayor of Avabruck | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Other Human creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mayor of Avabruck.
trans-unit.target: Other Human creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mayor of Avabruck.

trans-unit.resname: PISD·193★ | Mayor of Avabruck | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He can deny his true nature for only so long.
trans-unit.target: He can deny his true nature for only so long.

trans-unit.source: Each other creature you control that's a Werewolf or a Wolf gets +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack Alpha.
trans-unit.target: Each other creature you control that's a Werewolf or a Wolf gets +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack Alpha.
